messages.content:
Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "Discussions also revolved around security, energy, and economic development for the benefit of citizens."
Rot-12 text:
Pueogeeuaze mxea dqhaxhqp mdagzp eqogdufk, qzqdsk, mzp qoazayuo pqhqxabyqzf rad ftq nqzqruf ar oufulqze.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "That's our way of thinking and what we base our work on."
Rot-12 text:
Ftmf'e agd imk ar ftuzwuzs mzp itmf iq nmeq agd iadw az.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "Soon after, he built academic and literary careers."
Rot-12 text:
Eaaz mrfqd, tq nguxf mompqyuo mzp xufqdmdk omdqqde.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "No longer just a gentleman’s agreement, the co-management framework is a validation of the work of stakeholders both within and beyond the boundaries of parks."
Rot-12 text:
Za xazsqd vgef m sqzfxqymz’e msdqqyqzf, ftq oa-ymzmsqyqzf rdmyqiadw ue m hmxupmfuaz ar ftq iadw ar efmwqtaxpqde naft iuftuz mzp nqkazp ftq nagzpmduqe ar bmdwe.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "In 2022, the total trade turnover reached a historic high of USD 12.33 billion."
Rot-12 text:
Uz 2022, ftq fafmx fdmpq fgdzahqd dqmotqp m tuefaduo tust ar GEP 12.33 nuxxuaz.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "Much as it does today, India consisted of many religions, ethnicities and languages."
Rot-12 text:
Ygot me uf paqe fapmk, Uzpum oazeuefqp ar ymzk dqxusuaze, qftzuoufuqe mzp xmzsgmsqe.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "My generation of producers and I are now thinking of how to make the film practice sustainable."
Rot-12 text:
Yk sqzqdmfuaz ar bdapgoqde mzp U mdq zai ftuzwuzs ar tai fa ymwq ftq ruxy bdmofuoq egefmuzmnxq.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "Communication and information sharing between people, the government, and society have been significantly impacted by AI and data optimisation technologies in politics."
Rot-12 text:
Oayygzuomfuaz mzp uzradymfuaz etmduzs nqfiqqz bqabxq, ftq sahqdzyqzf, mzp eaouqfk tmhq nqqz euszuruomzfxk uybmofqp nk MU mzp pmfm abfuyuemfuaz fqotzaxasuqe uz baxufuoe.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "When we ran for office, we had no program and practically did not know what could be done."
Rot-12 text:
Itqz iq dmz rad arruoq, iq tmp za bdasdmy mzp bdmofuomxxk pup zaf wzai itmf oagxp nq pazq.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "A woman in a vibrant headscarf sings as she marches with the procession."
Rot-12 text:
M iaymz uz m hundmzf tqmpeomdr euzse me etq ymdotqe iuft ftq bdaoqeeuaz.
